title: In Failed Bitfinex Exploit Attempt, Billions in XRP Moved
description: The failed token transfers spooked some market watchers as they amounted to nearly half of XRP’s $30 billion market capitalization.

title: Google Follows Suit: Pulls Binance and Other Crypto Apps from its Indian Play Store
description: Google’s app store, Google Play, followed in Apple’s footsteps to remove Binance and other crypto exchanges like Kraken from its platform in India.
